tp:docstring.p: An interface on connections to mark a Channel messages as read or unread.

method.name: MarkRead
method.tp:docstring: Mark the referenced Channel history as read.

tp:docstring.p: A dictionary containing desirable properties, with the same semantics as the corresponding parameter to CreateChannel.
An identifier of the last read message. All messages up to this one should be marked as read. MUST NOT be an empty string.

method.name: MarkUnread
method.tp:docstring: Manually mark a Channel as unread.

tp:docstring.p: A dictionary containing desirable properties, with the same semantics as the corresponding parameter to CreateChannel.

tp:flags.name: Read_Reporting_Support_Flags
tp:flags.tp:docstring: Flags indicating the level of support for read reporting on this connection, as found on the ReadReportingSupport property.

tp:flag.tp:docstring: Clients MAY mark Channels as unread.

property.name: ReadReportingSupport
property.tp:docstring: A bitfield indicating features supported by this channel.
